name: Inflation Quest
description:
The more you defeat enemies in a row, the higher your experience points will be.
The more you hunt, the easier it is to raise the level
It ’s a game where you do n’t know when to quit.

Anyway, the level goes up with great momentum.
The 100 million level is not a dream!

Full of stories for conversations with chests of drawers, bookshelves, and villagers.

It takes 2 to 5 hours to clear.
